column4: メリッサ＿しょうがないな

せっかくだから、
この子たちにパーツについて、
説明してくれないかな。
column5: Since we came all this way, would you mind explaining to the boys about parts?
column11: Since we came all this way, would you mind explaining about parts to the boys?

column5: Sure thing.
column11: All right.

column4:
確かに、
一流の人形使いを目指すなら、
パーツも必要になるだろう。
column5: If you've got your eyes set on becoming a top-notch Puppeteer, parts are gonna be indispensable.
column11: That's true, if you've got your eyes on becoming top-notch Puppeteers, parts are gonna' be indispensable.

column4:
今度、うちのパーツショップに
寄るといい。
column5: You oughta drop in on my parts shop next time you're here.
column11: Next time, you should drop in our parts shop.

column4:
特別に好きなものを
売ってやるよ。
column5: I'll give you a special deal!
column11: I'll give you a special offer.

column4: メリッサ＿しょうがないな

column5: That's kind of you.
column11: That's kind of you.

column4:
じゃあ、今からパーツについて
教えてやる。
column5: Okay, let me tell you about using parts.
column11: Then, let me tell you about using parts.

column4:
パーツを装備することで、
マリオネーションギアを
強化することができる。
column5: By equipping new parts, you can enhance your Marionation Gear.
column11: By equipping new parts, you can enhance your Marionation Gear.

column4:
例えば、/c5真鍮装甲/c3を装備すれば、
耐久性が上がる。
column5: If you equip /c5Brass Armor/c3, for example, the durability will improve.
column11: For example, if /c5Brass Armour/c3 is equipped, the durability will improve.

column4:
/c5予備弾薬/c3を装備すれば、
弾数が増える。
column5: With /c5Spare Ammo/c3 equipped, you'll have more rounds to fire.
column11: With /c5Spare Ammo/c3 equipped, you'll have more rounds to fire.

column4:
だが、
パーツは、持っているだけでは
役にはたたん。
column5: But just 'cause you own a part doesn't mean it'll be useful right away.
column11: However, just because you own a part, doesn't mean it'll be useful immediately.

column4:
必ずマリオネーションギアに
装備するんだ。
column5: Make sure you equip the Marionation Gear with them first.
column11: Be sure to equip the Marionation Gear with them first.

column4:
マップ画面でＹボタンを押すと
人形を選ぶことができる。パー
ツも、この時に装備するんだ。
column5: Select your Puppets by pressing the Y Button from the map screen. That's where you can equip parts.
column11: You can select your mechs by pressing the Y button from the map screen. That's when you can equip parts, too.

column4:
だいたいの人形は、２つまで
パーツを装備できる。
column5: Puppets can generally be equipped with up to two parts.
column11: In general, most mechs can be equipped with up to 2 parts.

column4:
装備できる数は、
マリオネーションギアごとに
決まっているからな。
column5: The actual number you can equip depends on the Marionation Gear, though.
column11: But, the actual number that can be equipped will depend on the Marionation Gear.

column4:
それと、一度装備したパーツは、
取り外して再利用することは
できん。
column5: Also, once you've equipped a part, there's no taking it off and recycling it.
column11: Also, once you've equipped a part, it can't be dismantled and reused.

column4:
その人形に合わせて
調整してしまうからだ。
column5: It'll be modified to fit that Puppet's exact specs.
column11: They'll be modified to fit the specific requirements of that mech.

column4:
別のパーツと交換して、古い
パーツを廃棄することはできる。
column5: You can throw away an old part to replace it with a different one, though.
column11: Although, you can throw away an old part to replace it with a different one.

column4:
要するに、外すことはできるが、
他の人形に付け替えることは
できないってことだ。
column5: In other words, you can remove a part, but you can't reuse it on another Puppet.
column11: In other words, you can remove a part, but you can't reuse it on another mech.

column4:
それと、もう一つだけ
重要なことを教えておこう。
column5: And there's one more important thing I oughta tell you.
column11: And, there's one more important thing I ought to tell you.

column4:
時々、パーツ以外の物が
手に入ることがある。
column5: Sometimes, you'll pick up stuff other than parts.
column11: Sometimes, things other than parts can be obtained.

column4: 例えば/c5設計図/c3や/c5火龍水/c3だ。
column5: /c5Blueprints/c3, for instance, or some /c5Firewyrm Potion/c3.

column4:
これらはパーツじゃないから、
人形に取り付けることはでき
ない。
column5: Those aren't parts, so you can't equip them on a Puppet.
column11: For example, /c5Blueprints/c3, or some /c5Fiery Dragon Potion/c3.

column4:
ガロイ工房の/c5アイテム倉庫/c3に
保管されるから、そこで使用
するんだ。
column5: Galouye's Workshop acts as your /c5Item Warehouse/c3, so you can use them there.
column11: Galouye's Workshop acts as your /c5Item Warehouse/c3, where you can also use them.

column5: That's it, basically.
column11: Well, they had to go somewhere.

column4:
じゃ、パーツショップを
開けておくからな。
column5: Right, then! Feel free to drop by the Parts Shop some time. My door's always open.
column11: Right then, feel free to drop by the Parts Shop some time. Our doors are always open.
